name: Embedded Control System
author: Jogesh K. Muppala <muppala@cse.ust.hk>
Gianfranco Ciardo <ciardo@iastate.edu>
Kishor S. Trivedi <kst@ee.duke.edu>
description: This model is part of the PRISM Benchmark Suite [1] and closely based on the one in [0]. The system comprises an input processor which reads and processes data from three sensors. It is then polled by a main processor which, in turn, passes instructions to an output processor. The output processor takes the instructions it receives and uses them to control two actuators. A bus connects the three processors together. Each of them can fail and cycles are skipped, which after `MAX_COUNT´ skipped cycles leads to a shut down. See [2] for more details

parameters.name: MAX_COUNT
parameters.description: Limit on allowed number of consecutive cycles skipped

properties.name: actuators_T
properties.description: The probability of actuator failure within `T´ hours.

properties.name: danger_T
properties.description: The expected time spent in "danger" by time `T´ (hours).

properties.name: danger_time
properties.description: The expected time spent in "danger" before "down".

properties.name: down_T
properties.description: The expected time spent in "down" by time `T´ (hours).

properties.name: failure_T
properties.description: The probability of any failure occurring within `T´ hours.

properties.name: io_T
properties.description: The probability of I/O failure within `T´ hours.

properties.name: main_T
properties.description: The probability of main system failure within `T´ hours.

properties.name: sensors_T
properties.description: The probability of sensor failure within `T´ hours.

properties.name: up_T
properties.description: The expected time spent in "up" by time `T´ (hours).

properties.name: up_time
properties.description: The expected time spent in "up" before "down".
